notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, R.T. and N.G.P.; chemical analysis, M.B. and R.T.; biological investigation, M.L. and M.R.L.; writing-original draft preparation, M.L. and M.B.; writing-review and editing, R.T., M.R.L., and N.G.P.; supervision, R.T. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
